alert.note: Alert for Pacific; Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 12:47PM PST until January 07 at 5:31PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Willapa River near Willapa affecting Pacific County. Naselle River near Naselle affecting Pacific and Wahkiakum Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Naselle River near Naselle. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect flooding in numerous lowland areas along the Naselle. Historically, water begins to surround homes along and near the river at this point. A few roads are flooded at this level, including low sections of State Route 4. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM PST Friday the stage was 15.0 feet. - The river has crested around 18.3 ft around 700 PM PST Thursday. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued tonight at 1000 PM PST.
